page.title: 07COUNTRY PARK AND SPORTS BARN
page.content: In{Drumpellier Country Park}there is a wide variety of{trees,birds and {animals.}The{silverbirch,oak,and rowan grow in the park along side small woods of{fir trees.}In the loch{swans and{ducks}are to be found.{Robins, {magpies,crows,blackbirds and sparrows are all to be seen as you walk through the wooded areas. Sometimes when all is quiet you can see{squirrels and {rabbits}and if you are very lucky you may see a{deer}crash through the undergrowyh In{Kirkwood Sports Barn}a lot of {sporting activties}take place. For {boxing}they have special{apparatus like an{exercise bike, weights, {punchbags, skipping ropes,}and{a real {boxing ring.}A{five aside football {park}is laid out for men and children. {Badminton courts}can be reserved by both adults and children alike.
